scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --default-input-target 2 --handle-input  --names "SPARCS,Client-Dev,Server-Dev" --prefix "[{name}][{time}]" --timestamp-format "HH:mm:ss" --prefix-colors "yellow.bold,blue.bold,green.bold" "yarn dev:introduce" "cd client && yarn dev" "cd server && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:introduce:
echo "[ Welcome to SPARCS NEWBIE Project Dev Server ]

"
